biography.summary: Katie Britt is the Republican U.S. Senator from Alabama serving since January 3, 2023. Prior to her Senate tenure, she was involved in business and public policy roles in Alabama.
biography.early_life: Born in 1982; details not specified in this source.
biography.education: Education details not specified in this source.
biography.career: Career includes political campaign work and leadership roles prior to and during her Senate tenure.

contact.office_address: 416 Russell Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510
